channel.title: chapliboy and the astra fellowship
channel.description: Recent content on chapliboy and the astra fellowship

item.title: hiveminder
item.description: The goal for the first jam was to figure out how I can distill what I enjoy most about city builders, and build the simplest version of that for the jam. When I say city builder, I am mostly referring to games like Pharaoh and Caesar 3. What I like the most about the genre- Growth. Starting off with a small colony and then slowly watching it grow over time.
